subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jalen Rose, one of only two Knicks to have played in the N.B.A. finals, is a tad dumbfounded at the preception that he might not have a role on the Knicks.
snippet: Jalen Rose, one of only two Knicks to have played in the N.B.A. finals, is a tad dumbfounded at the preception that he might not have a role on the Knicks.
